rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2440, ETC2520, ETC5252} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETC3510, ETC3514, MTH3251}

description: Mathematical definition of options and other financial derivatives; probability models; mathematical models of random processes; applications; numerical methods; Monte Carlo methods.
